scripts.dev: NODE_ENV=development npx ts-node-dev --prefer-ts true --no-notify -r tsconfig-paths/register --watch src --transpile-only src/server.ts
scripts.migrate: npm run build && NODE_ENV=development npx sequelize-cli db:migrate
scripts.start: npm run build && NODE_ENV=production node dist/src/server.js
scripts.migrate-prod: npm run build && NODE_ENV=production npx sequelize-cli db:migrate
scripts.seed: npm run build && npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all
